summary: The follower is a verry skilled assassasin and The marriage is verry beautiful girl that you can marriage
descriptionHtml:
The follower is a verry skilled assassasin and The marriage is verry beautiful girl that you can marriage. You can find them in sleeping giant inn. To marriage you need to go to riften and find Maramal he is one of the priest of Mara. Speak to him and he will say that you need an amulet of mara and he give it to you for 200 . Then speak to the girl in the sleeping giant inn. \"are you intrested in me\" will apear . Choose that talk to Maramal again and he will say that the marriage sould be from dawn (6 am) to dusk (6 pm). Be there in 6 am say \"I do now and forever\".
Congratualations you are married !
Sorry but I can\'t make images .
Sorry for my bad english .
If you want me to make more fast good mods donate on that address : https://www.paypal.com/bg/cgi-bin/webscr?SESSION=-wGxARs7zP9jp3m3KfZvxvv1GKrmlqxN4CMHpIPFfeUhfg_g1zT4fjEVmta&dispatch=5885d80a13c0db1f8e263663d3faee8d0b7e678a25d883d0fa72c947f193f8fd
Thanks !
author: George
